answers.answer: Hello,One possibility that is related to your symptoms is iron deficiency anemia.Pls get your Hb and MCV,MCH and MCHC done.Also eat a healthy nutritious diet and iron supplements for some days.If the symptoms persist then it is important to rule out other possibilities.They include chronic fatigue  syndrome,hypothyroidism, disorders of the hypothalamus,psychiatric disorders like depression and diabetes.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing and if you have any additional queries.
